overview:
President and Chief Operating Officer

Neal Ringquist is the President and Chief Operating Officer of ASI. He oversees all aspects of Advisor Softwareâ€™s operations and is responsible for setting and driving the overall company strategy.

Most recently, Neal served as vice president of sales and marketing for Morningstar Associates, LLC, a registered investment advisor and wholly owned subsidiary of Morningstar, Inc. Prior to Morningstar, he was executive vice president of sales, marketing, and client service for mPower.com, Inc., a privately held San Francisco-based investment advisory firm that was acquired by Morningstar in July 2003 . Neal earned a Bachelorâ€™s degree in economics from Middlebury College and an M.B.A. from the University of Chicago Booth School of Business.
